enb_long_title: Thirty-third Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
sentences: This session, held from 11-14 October 2010 in Busan, Republic of Korea, addressed the recommendations of the IAC Review.
The Panel adopted a number of decisions in response to the IAC Review, including on the treatment of grey literature and uncertainty, and a process to address errors in previous reports.

The Panel established task groups on processes and procedures, communications, conflict of interest policy and management and governance, to address recommendations that required further examination and present their results to IPCC-33.
They Panel also accepted a revised outline for the AR5 SYR.
Earth Negotiations Bulletin coverage of IPCC 32 can be found at: http://www.iisd.ca/climate/ipcc32.
